logger.doc:name: Impl Start Log
logger.message:
#[output application/json
---
{
timeStamp: now(),
executionTime: now() - vars.startTime,
logPoint: "START_IMPL",
flowName: flow.name,
appName: app.name,
message: "Starting execution of implementation flow",
payload: if(isEmpty(payload)) "" else payload
}]

logger.doc:name: Impl End Log
logger.message:
#[output application/json
---
{
timeStamp: now(),
executionTime: now() - vars.startTime,
logPoint: "END_SUCCESS_IMPL",
flowName: flow.name,
appName: app.name,
message: "Starting execution of implementation flow",
payload: if(isEmpty(payload)) "" else payload
}]
